overview:
Pris is the CEO, co-founder and game designer of Be-novative with a pscyology background and expertise in the innovation field.

Before Be-novative, she had her specialization of Master’s studies in educational psychology together with organizational and work psychology in Budapest and Copenhagen with an interest in creativity and self-development. At the age of 20-23, she was the leader of the educational section of the national youth association New Generation and the secretary of the liberal educational cabinet organizing several national campaigns and conferences on developing students skills by playful learning.

Before graduation, in 2009, she started working with TREBAG and Net-Mex as a researcher-developer and managed over 15 R&D and innovation consultancy projects together with European Lifelong Learning projects representing Hungary. She wrote the successful project proposal and 2,5 years workplan of the OpenInn ICT project based on her thesis in 2010, which is now supported by the European Commission by 500.000 Euros to be implemented in 8 countries. The project idea involves developing methods enhancing creativity and opening new career opportunities for youth through joining open innovation.

Thanks to an early stage success and her interest in serious games, she formed the idea of Be-novative and initiated establishing Be-novative and Bee-novator Hungary.

Besides work, she likes sports, did 7 years of kung-fu and won a national kung-fu competition. She likes Italian and Asian reform cooking.
